verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My heart was ever like a stone, My tongue still as the grave; But from another world there shone A light thy soul to save

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Now, I am singing all day long The praises of His blood; No other theme awakes my song Like Calvary's crimson flood.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I felt the pressure of His hand Bending my sinful heart, Henceforth, no power can command My soul from Him to part.
